channel.title: CVE Feed for AREAL SAS -- Topkapi Vision (Server)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AREAL SAS -- Topkapi Vision (Server)

item.title: CVE-2023-50356|2024-02-15T10:52:21.178Z -- areal%20sas -- topkapi%20vision%20%28server%29
item.description: SSL connections to some LDAP servers are vulnerable to a man-in-the-middle attack due to improper certificate validation in AREAL Topkapi Vision (Server). This allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to gather sensitive information and prevent valid users from login.
